subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The Missouri reserve quarterback Blaine Dalton has been kicked off the team after a campus arrest on suspicion of drunken driving, Coach Gary Pinkel said. The campus police said Dalton, a highly regarded freshman, was arrested at 1:16 a.m. Friday on suspicion of driving while intoxicated, failing to drive in a single lane and operating an unlicensed motor vehicle. He posted $500 bond and was released.
